experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer Intern
responsibilities: Developed a web scraping tool using Tampermonkey, Python, and MySQL to automate data collection from e-commerce platforms
Built an automated platform using LLMs (GPT-4, Stable Diffusion) to generate A+ content for Amazon listings, increasing conversion rates by 10%-25%
Leveraged Flask and Node.js to design the back-end infrastructure
Utilized GitHub for version control and collaboration
Performed prompt engineering and fine-tuning techniques for the automatic A+ content generator
Conducted A/B testing to ensure model robustness and accuracy

experience.title: Consulting Intern, HR Consulting (Automobile Team)
responsibilities: Developed and implemented a data pipeline using Python to screen compensation data and perform quantile regression calculations
Conducted data cleansing and corrected over 200 errors, enhancing data accuracy by 15%
Matched over 20,000 position titles for talent research projects
Drafted a 22-page industry report on talent trends influenced by electric vehicle and autonomous driving technologies

experience.title: Intern, Financial Services Department
responsibilities: Automated short-term stock selection using a Python-based application with Tencent Finance API
Created a user-friendly interface with TkInter for the stock selection tool
Produced investment strategy visualizations for stakeholder communication

projects.title: Predictive Analytics for Soccer Performance
details: Developed a data pipeline and utilized OOP principles in Python to process soccer event data
Used PyTorch framework and ensemble learning with Random Forest, XGBoost, and CNN to predict expected goals and passing success
Created an interactive website using Streamlit for performance analysis

projects.title: Aspect-Based Analysis of User Reviews' Impact on Online Healthcare Consultations
details: Scraped 5M+ consultation records and 1M+ reviews from an online healthcare app
Utilized LCF-ATEPC method with BERT model for sentiment analysis
Clustered 14 categories of aspect words and analyzed their impact using linear regression
